document_data.mainbody:
The Herd is an adventure module set in Malatra – Living Jungle using the Dungeons & Dragons 3 edition ruleset. It is part of the Living Jungle series of adventures published for the RPGA Network. It is an adventure designed for characters of ny level.
In the Year of Tigers Curse (1374 DR), the Chief of the Tribe of Big Chief Bagoomba, old Bengoukee, contacted a group of heroes of the Living Jungle through a dream and asked for the help in stopping an unnatural garuda stampede that threatened the Rudra tribe. Heroes guided to the mysterious Spirit Cave where they were transformed into garuda, ready to infiltrate the deadly herd. Soon, the disguised heroes discovered that the herd was magically led by a massive flesh lizard wearing a seemingly indestructible amulet that belonged to ostracized sorcerer of the menaced tribe – Halussa. After removing Halussas ruby from the flesh lizard, the herd quickly dispersed and the garuda heroes confronted the malicious sorcerer.
